channel.title: Okay on Truslavistan State News Archive
channel.description: Recent content in Okay on Truslavistan State News Archive

item.title: PROGRESS STALLS IN BANDWIDTH CRISIS
item.description: MONDAY – After an accidental leak of classified information by erroneous ex-journalist Papov Pavokovish in last week’s publication, mass shortages of bandwidth were observed to have occurred on the People’s Wireless after the top secret password was published for all to see. With the normal leaks of top secret information resulting in instant death under the hoofs of a hundred hungry swine, Pavokovish received a lighter sentence after saying he was, in essence, “giving interwebs to the peoples.
